fields.description:
During the sprint 1 tracer, I cobbled together a place to store resource information to temporarily hold information for update.  This was insufficient for rollback, so I would prefer the db simply contain different 'versions' of resources and stacks. It will simplify the update and rollback logic.

Testing will just verify that the update stack workflow still works.
fields.summary: CF: convert ad-hoc update storage to revisioned entities

comments.body:
*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.3.0-0.25084.394.20160830git660153b.el7}}

*Steps*

# After running a few UpdateStack scenarios, check the relation 'stack_workflows' to confirm unique versions for resources:
{code}
# psql -p 8777 -h /var/lib/eucalyptus/db/data/ eucalyptus_shared
eucalyptus_shared=# set search_path to eucalyptus_cloudformation;
SET
eucalyptus_shared=# select * from stack_workflows;
                id                |   creation_timestamp    |  last_update_timestamp  |          metadata_perm_uuid          | version |        domain
   |                run_id                |                                                    stack_id
|             workflow_id              |             workflow_type

---+--------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+--------------------------------------+----------------------------------------

in | e6fb4bf8-858e-4746-a67e-40388cd5d8be | arn:aws:cloudformation::000746231680:stack/euca-internal-imaging-service/252022db-ea8c-4c3f-a15b-51d95a7725a9
